item.title: gem
item.description: RubyGems # 安装 # ruby setup.rb 参考：https://rubygems.org/pages/download RubyGems installed the following executables: /opt/homebrew/Cellar/ruby/3.2.2/bin/gem /opt/homebrew/Cellar/ruby/3.2.2/bin/bundle /opt/homebrew/Cellar/ruby/3.2.2/bin/bundler Ruby Interactive (ri) documentation was installed. ri is kind of like man pages for Ruby libraries. You may access it like this: ri Classname ri Classname.class_method ri Classname#instance_method
